thread.title: RESOLUTE Partners Acquires Assets of Vermont Summit Technologies
thread.title_full: RESOLUTE Partners Acquires Assets of Vermont Summit Technologies - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: RESOLUTE Partners Acquires Assets of Vermont Summit Technologies
text:
Acquisition to optimize Summit Technologies services and expand RESOLUTE’s presence in industry verticals for wired and wireless services.
(PRWEB) October 22, 2015
Southington, Conn. - October 22, 2015 - RESOLUTE Partners , a leader in advanced wired and wireless network solutions for commercial and government agencies, today announced the asset acquisition of SUMMIT Technologies , a Vermont-based company that enables and empowers wireless mobility.
“Our two companies have a great deal of synergy,” said RESOLUTE Partners CEO Michael Blanco. “SUMMIT is well established company in northern Vermont with a mix of commercial and governmental clients, who will benefit from our enhanced service offerings by providing additional technical and business resources to support current and new customers.”
RESOLUTE Partners benefits from the acquisition by gaining new customers and an expanding presence in the New England region in a variety of industries, including hospitality and resorts, healthcare, state government, education, retail, commercial and business. SUMMIT boasts several top regional businesses, including Alexion Pharmaceuticals, Capitol Plaza, Claybrook at Sugarbush Resort, CONA Bank North, State of Vermont, Woodstock Inn & Resort, Yankee Candle Company INC, and Mass MoCA as well as a various condominium developers, retail and hospitality operations, and higher education. The newly acquired clientele adds to RESOLUTE’s broad range of wired and wireless clients, including more than 20 Department of Veteran Affairs Hospitals around the nation.
“Working with RESOLUTE Partners will allow SUMMIT's team to focus on developing and deploying the latest wireless technologies for new and existing clients,” said SUMMIT Technologies CEO Keith Mattes. “We will also be able to optimize customer support and focus on expanding services and sales aggressively in the region.”
SUMMIT will remain a separate business unit and do business as SUMMIT Technologies (A RESOLUTE Partners Company). Key SUMMIT staff will remain in place to serve the existing clients and provide support to an expanding RESOLUTE client base.
If you would like to discuss your wired or wireless needs, contact sales@resolutepartners.com. For more information about the range of services and expertise we offer, please visit our web site at http://www.resolutepartners.com .
About RESOLUTE Partners
RESOLUTE Partners engineers, installs, operates and maintains a complete range of Internet access and fixed wireless communications solutions for healthcare, government and commercial enterprises around the world, including hospitals, educational facilities, military bases and office parks. All designed to offer an enhanced experience for end users, improve operating efficiencies, reduce costs and create new business opportunities for our customers. Established in 1997, RESOLUTE Partners has the knowledge, discipline and experience to deliver on all of your network needs, including guest Wi-Fi, rural broadband and energy management and control networks. Customers include US Department of Veterans Affairs, The US Army, US Marine Corp, SENECA Nation of Indians and Johnson Controls. RESOLUTE is ready to provide a portfolio of services as a prime contractor or through teaming agreements with other contract holders.
About SUMMIT Technologies
SUMMIT Technologies, based in Williston, VT, enables and empowers wireless mobility. SUMMIT specializes in Radio Frequency (RF) Engineering as it applies to high-speed wireless networking. SUMMIT's expertise lies in the design, deployment and support of Wireless Local and Wide Area Networks. SUMMIT's networks are utilized within hospitality, healthcare, warehousing, airports, MDUs, corporations, campus environments, and special event venues. SUMMIT offers many additional services including location based reporting and in-building cellular enhancement. Over the years, SUMMIT has developed a refined suite of project management, design, implementation, support, maintenance and monitoring expertise to produce the most cost-effective, robust, wireless networks possible. SUMMIT represents leading manufacturers including Cisco, Aruba, Ruckus and Hewlett-Packard.
